name: 4X4 Offroad Challenge - 3D Maximum Hill Climb Car
name_original: 4X4 Offroad Challenge - 3D Maximum Hill Climb Car
description:
Drive the most amazing offroad vehicles of all time in this wild and extreme hill climbing Game '4X4 Offroad Challenge'!


Features:
>24 Off-Road Trucks for driving and hill climbing
>Amazing Wild 3D Graphics, full of details to explore
>Multiple Driving Missions to complete
>Precise physics simulation
>Real time vehicle deformation
>Retina display support for iPad and iPhone



Fasten your seatbelts, it's gonna be a tough ride!
